turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'd like to get a coffee on my way to work, could you order one so I can pick it up on my way?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order from the Peet's coffee on Harrison Ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what should I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please get me a golden caffe latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add any sweetener?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please add a little honey

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will put the order in for a medium golden caffe latte with whole milk and a little honey, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you make sure it is extra hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What time will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have put in the order and it will be ready in 15 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I pay with the information on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, it is all set, and I have emailed the receipt to you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome
